items.title: Collaborative Task Management
items.description: Enable users to create, assign, and track tasks within a team environment.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create tasks with title, description, due date, and assignee
Team members can view all tasks assigned to them or their team
Tasks can be updated with status changes (e.g., To Do, In Progress, Done)
Changes to tasks are visible to all team members in real-time
non_functional: Real-time updates with latency under 2 seconds
Support for at least 100 concurrent users

notes: The requirement is high-level; assumptions made about basic task fields, status tracking, and real-time collaboration.
